plot: Kyle, Mr. Garrison and Mr. Slave travel to New York City to bring an end to the latest "metrosexual" fad, and discover that it's actually part of a crab-people conspiracy to take over the planet.

When the metro-sexual craze hits South Park, Kyle and Mr. Garrison travel to New York to meet with the cast of "Queer Eye For The Straight Guy." When they arrive, they discover the cast's horrible secret.—Mike
